Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptide therapeutics for cystic fibrosis.
Literature.Author: Zhang L, Parente J, Harris SM, Woods DE, Hancock RE, Falla TJ

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human fibroblasts WI-38:LD50=32 µg/ml,Human leukocytes:LD50=80 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=20 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=4µg/ml),Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa M76(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa M917(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa M1251(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa M1426(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa R70(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=4µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas stutzeri(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas fluorescens(MIC=16µg/ml),Ralstonia pickettii(MIC=16µg/ml),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia(MIC=2µg/ml),Achromobacter xylosoxidans(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=5µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MFC=25µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=10µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=4µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MFC=25µg/ml),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(LD50=16µg/ml),Human colon adenocarcinoma SW480(LD50=14µg/ml),Human melanoma BMKC(LD50=16µg/ml),Human lung carcinoma H1299(LD50=7µg/ml),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa S3(LD50=15µg/ml),Human prostate adenocarcinoma PC-3(LD50=47µg/ml)
